ticket.title: OrderedHash should not pretend to be an Array
ticket.original-body: The ActiveSupport::OrderedHash that comes back from such methods as #group_by looks, in script/console, indistinguishable from an Array, which makes me want to call methods on it like an array, which leads to pain and confusion. Attached is a tiny patch that adds an #inspect method to ActiveSupport::OrderedHash that produces output that looks like this: http://pastie.org/364930 Goal is to make it clear that you're dealing with an OrderedHash, but also to encourage you to think of it as having hash-like rather than array-like indexing.

Attached is a tiny patch that adds an #inspect method to ActiveSupport::OrderedHash that produces output that looks like this: http://pastie.org/364930 Goal is to make it clear that you're dealing with an OrderedHash, but also to encourage you to think of it as having hash-like rather than array-like indexing.

version.title: [PATCH] OrderedHash should not pretend to be an Array

version.diffable-attributes: --- :title: "[PATCH] OrderedHash should not pretend to be an Array"
version.title: OrderedHash should not pretend to be an Array

version.body: I'm the one that badgered greg over twitter into submitting this patch :) However, #to_hash isn't working for me for some reason. However, since the hash is ordered in Ruby 1.9, I want to change #inspect to match ruby 1.9's Hash.
version.body-html: I'm the one that badgered greg over twitter into submitting this patch :) However, #to_hash isn't working for me for some reason. However, since the hash is ordered in Ruby 1.9, I want to change #inspect to match ruby 1.9's Hash.
version.title: OrderedHash should not pretend to be an Array

version.body:
(from [f4bf318db061daa8c6ebb2b700fd15034e031310]) add an inspect method to OrderedHash to make it clear that it is not a species of Array
Signed-off-by: Michael Koziarski <michael@koziarski.com> [#1782 state:committed] http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/f4bf318db061daa8c6ebb2b700fd15034e031310
version.body-html:
(from [f4bf318db061daa8c6ebb2b700fd15034e031310]) add an inspect method to OrderedHash to make it clear that it is not a species of Array

Signed-off-by: Michael Koziarski michael@koziarski.com [#1782 state:committed] http://github.com/rails/rails/co...
version.title: OrderedHash should not pretend to be an Array
